name: BEATING THE STORM! American Airlines First Class, Embraer 175, Chicago O'Hare to Atlanta
description:
Watch our little Embraer regional jet beat a terrific thunderstorm over Atlanta Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport. We're the last plane in before the storm engulfs the airfield. Rather lucky!

This video features all of the usual highlights - lounge, boarding, takeoff, landing and all the service points in between. I also point out some geographic features along the route. Enjoy the video, and leave me a comment!

You can also follow me on:

Twitter, @pauls_trips

Snapchat: pauls_trips
